survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness and satisfaction levels of remote onboarding processes for new employees in distributed teams.

questions.question_text: How would you rate the overall effectiveness of your remote onboarding experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for clarity. Ensure mobile-friendly radio button layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: single-choice radio buttons. Randomize option order to prevent bias.

script.question_text: How would you rate the overall effectiveness of your remote onboarding experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include 'Other' with text field for unique responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: multi-select checkboxes with 'Other' triggering open-text field.

script.question_text: Which of the following onboarding resources did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the biggest challenge you faced during your remote onboarding?
questions.client_notes: Use open-ended format to capture nuanced responses. Limit response to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text response with character counter.

script.question_text: What was the biggest challenge you faced during your remote onboarding?

questions.question_text: How many virtual check-ins did you have with your manager during your first month?
questions.client_notes: Use single-choice format with clear frequency ranges.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio buttons with vertical layout.

script.question_text: How many virtual check-ins did you have with your manager during your first month?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for our remote onboarding program?
questions.client_notes: Use paragraph-style text box. Prompt respondents to consider technology, communication, and training aspects.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: open-text response with multi-line input.
